deeperwin.configuration.Configuration

class deeperwin.configuration.Configuration(*, physical: deeperwin.configuration.PhysicalConfig = None, model: deeperwin.configuration.DeepErwinModelConfig = DeepErwinModelConfig(net_width=40, net_depth=2, n_hidden_bf_factor=[40, 20, 20], n_hidden_bf_shift=[40, 40], n_hidden_jastrow=[40, 40], output_shift=1, distance_feature_powers=[- 1], n_rbf_features=32, eps_dist_feat=0.01, n_pairwise_features=33, embedding=SimpleSchnetConfig(net_width=40, net_depth=2, name='simple_schnet', n_hidden_w=[40, 40], n_hidden_h=[40, 40], n_hidden_g=[40], embedding_dim=64, n_iterations=2, use_res_net=False), use_bf_factor=True, use_bf_shift=True, use_jastrow=True, el_el_shift_decay=False, target_el=False, sum_first=False, sigma_pauli=True, use_trainable_shift_decay_radius=True, baseline=CASSCFConfig(name='casscf', basis_set='6-311G', n_determinants=20, cusps=CuspCorrectionConfig(cusp_type='mo', use=True, r_cusp_el_el=1.0, r_cusp_el_ion_scale=1.0)), register_scale=True), restart: deeperwin.configuration.RestartConfig = None, comment: str = None, experiment_name: str = None, mcmc: deeperwin.configuration.MCMCConfig = MCMCConfig(n_walkers_opt=2048, n_walkers_eval=2048, max_age_opt=20, max_age_eval=20, proposal=MCMCSimpleProposalConfig(name='normal'), n_inter_steps=10, n_burn_in_opt=2000, n_burn_in_eval=500, target_acceptance_rate=0.5, min_stepsize_scale=0.01, max_stepsize_scale=1.0), optimization: deeperwin.configuration.OptimizationConfig = OptimizationConfig(optimizer=AdamOptimizerConfig(name='adam', order=1, b1=0.9, b2=0.999, eps=1e-08), schedule=InverseLRScheduleConfig(name='inverse', decay_time=500.0), checkpoints=[], intermediate_eval=None, shared_modules=None, learning_rate=0.0015, n_epochs=10000, n_epochs_prev=0, batch_size=512, use_batch_reweighting=False, clipping=ClippingConfig(name='tanh', width_metric='std', center='mean', unclipped_center=False, clip_by=5.0), interdependent=False), evaluation: deeperwin.configuration.EvaluationConfig = EvaluationConfig(forces=None, n_epochs=2000), logging: deeperwin.configuration.LoggingConfig = LoggingConfig(tags=[], log_opt_state=False, basic=BasicLoggerConfig(n_skip_epochs=9, log_level='DEBUG', fname='log.out', log_to_stdout=True), wandb=None, pickle=PickleLoggerConfig(n_skip_epochs=0, fname='results.bz2')), computation: deeperwin.configuration.ComputationConfig = ComputationConfig(float_precision='float32', dispatch='auto', vsc3=VSC3Config(queue='gpu_rtx2080ti', time='1day', conda_env='jax'), vsc4=VSC4Config(queue='mem_0096', time='1day'), dgx=DGXConfig(time='1day', conda_env='jax'), use_gpu=True, disable_jit=False))[source]

Bases: deeperwin.configuration.ConfigModel

__init__(**data: Any) → None

Create a new model by parsing and validating input data from keyword arguments.

Raises ValidationError if the input data cannot be parsed to form a valid model.
